claims.claim: Zurich detected substantial increase in fraudulent claims, averting millions in fraud annually
claims.quote: Zurich detected a substantial increase in fraudulent claims, averting millions in fraud annually.

claims.claim: Efficiency improvements in claims processing freed up resources for legitimate claims and customer support
claims.quote: The efficiency in processing claims and detecting fraud has also freed up resources, allowing more focus on legitimate claims and customer support.

claims.claim: Digital workforce processed three million transactions, freeing up human workers for customer service
claims.quote: In total, the digital workforce has processed three million transactions, freeing up Zurich UK's frontline human workers to focus on providing outstanding customer service.

claims.claim: 55 digital workers manage over 120 processes for enhanced customer experience
claims.quote: Today, 55 Blue Prism digital workers manage over 120 processes for the insurer... In each case digital workers have contributed to an enhanced digital customer experience with automation.

claims.claim: Achieved 85% hit rate for automated cash application
claims.quote: Automated Cash Application: Achieved an 85% hit rate for cash application through HighRadius software.

claims.claim: Freed up six full-time employees (33% of the team) from cash application tasks
claims.quote: Resource Optimization: Freed up six full-time employees (33% of the team) from cash application tasks, allowing reallocation to critical tasks.

claims.claim: Saved 100% on bank lockbox fees through AI-powered OCR
claims.quote: Cost Savings: Saved 100% on bank lockbox fees by utilizing AI-powered Optical Character Recognition for check remittance data capture.

claims.claim: Reduced claim processing time from 24 hours to 3 working hours
claims.quote: Ultimately, with Zara's support Zurich can now process the claim within three working hours, compared to the previous targeted 24 hours.

claims.claim: Chatbot handled 765 customer interactions representing 20% of reported claims volume in first 6 weeks
claims.quote: In the first 6 weeks, Zara received 765 customer interactions (20% of the reported claims volume) and received a great feedback from both customers and Claims Handler.

claims.claim: 60% of claims were made outside office hours via chatbot, providing 24/7 service
claims.quote: Zara helped customers make claims at any time of the day. So far, around 60% of claims were made outside of office hours via Zara.
